title: Ethereum Layer 2 Taiko Live On Mainnet
description: The post Ethereum Layer 2 Taiko Live On Mainnet appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The Ethereum-based rollup Taiko is launched on the Ethereum mainnet as Vitalik Buterin proposed the inaugural block on Taikos mainnet. At the initial stage, Taikos rollup protocol contracts on Ethereum are controlled by a multisig arrangement. Taiko has a type-1 zero-knowledge virtual machine designed to emulate the Ethereum architecture, which includes a multi-proof proving system.
content: The post Ethereum Layer 2 Taiko Live On Mainnet appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The Ethereum-based rollup Taiko is launched on the Ethereum mainnet as Vitalik Buterin proposed the inaugural block on Taikos mainnet. At the initial stage, Taikos rollup protocol contracts on Ethereum are controlled by a multisig arrangement. Taiko has a type-1 zero-knowledge virtual machine designed to emulate the Ethereum architecture, which includes a multi-proof proving system.
